chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.sale.stage.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Sale Stage
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, coalesce(nullif(message_value, ''), message_key) as _sale_stage FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id LEFT JOIN meta_translation ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :__user__ WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.sales_stage_select AND message_key = selection_item.title AND meta_translation.language = _user.language GROUP BY selection_item.id, message_value, message_key ORDER BY selection_item.id

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.sale.stage.amount.funnel
chart.title: Opportunities By Sale Stage
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, coalesce(nullif(message_value, ''), message_key) as _sale_stage FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id LEFT JOIN meta_translation ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :__user__ WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.sales_stage_select AND self.sales_stage_select != 10 AND message_key = selection_item.title AND meta_translation.language = _user.language GROUP BY selection_item.id, message_value, message_key ORDER BY selection_item.id

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.by.stage.type.bar
chart.title: Pipeline by Stage and Type
chart.dataset:
SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, coalesce(nullif(message_value, ''), message_key) as _sale_stage, opp_type.name as opp_type_name
FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN crm_opportunity_type opp_type ON self.opportunity_type = opp_type.id LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id LEFT JOIN meta_translation ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :__user__ WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.sales_stage_select and self.sales_stage_select not in (9, 10) AND message_key = selection_item.title AND meta_translation.language = _user.language GROUP BY selection_item.id, message_value, message_key,opp_type_name ORDER BY selection_item.id

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.source.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Source
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, Source.name as _source FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_source as Source ON self.source = Source.id GROUP BY _source ORDER BY _source

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.type.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Type
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, opportunity_type.name as _opportunity_type FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN crm_opportunity_type as opportunity_type ON self.opportunity_type = opportunity_type.id GROUP BY opportunity_type.name ORDER BY opportunity_type.name

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.won.by.leadsource.bar
chart.title: Opportunities Won By Lead Source
chart.dataset: SELECT count(*) AS lead_won, Source.name as _source FROM crm_opportunity self JOIN base_source as Source ON self.source = Source.id and self.sales_stage_select = 5 GROUP BY _source ORDER BY _source

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.won.by.saleman.bar
chart.title: Opportunities Won By Salesman
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, sale_man.full_name as _sale_man FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN auth_user as sale_man ON self.user_id = sale_man.id AND sale_man.full_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY _sale_man ORDER BY _sale_man

chart.name: chart.dashboard.events.by.team
chart.title: Events by team
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS total_event, _team.name as team_name FROM ical_event as self LEFT JOIN team_team as _team ON self.team = _team.id GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY team_name

chart.name: chart.dashboard.events.by.saleman
chart.title: Events by saleman

chart.name: chart.opportunities.by.origin.by.stage
chart.title: Opportunities By Origin By Stage
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, src.name AS source, coalesce(nullif(message_value, ''), message_key) as stage FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_source src on src.id = self.source LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id LEFT JOIN meta_translation ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :__user__ WHERE selection_item.value = cast(self.sales_stage_select as char) AND message_key = selection_item.title AND meta_translation.language = _user.language GROUP BY selection_item.id, src.name, message_value, message_key ORDER BY selection_item.id, src.name

chart.name: chart.opportunities.pipeline.next.90d
chart.title: Pipeline next 90 days
chart.dataset:
SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, coalesce(nullif(message_value, ''), message_key) as stage, 'Pipeline' as pipeline FROM crm_opportunity self JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id LEFT JOIN meta_translation ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :__user__ WHERE selection_item.value = cast(self.sales_stage_select as char) AND self.expected_close_date < current_date+ interval '90 day' AND self.sales_stage_select <9 AND message_key = selection_item.title AND meta_translation.language = _user.language
GROUP BY selection_item.id, pipeline, message_value, message_key ORDER BY selection_item.id

chart.name: chart.calls.types.by.user.bar
chart.title: Calls type by user

chart.name: chart.calls.types.by.team.by.user.bar
chart.title: Calls by user(of a team)

SELECT COUNT(_event.id) AS _total_calls, _user.full_name AS _user_name, _meta._select_title AS _event_type FROM ical_event AS _event LEFT JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _event.user_id = _user.id JOIN (SELECT cast(_item.value as int) AS _select_value, coalesce(nullif(message_value, ''), message_key) AS _select_title FROM meta_select AS _selection JOIN meta_select_item AS _item ON _selection.name = 'crm.event.type.select' AND _item.select_id = _selection.id LEFT JOIN meta_translation ON _item.select_id = _selection.id JOIN auth_user AS _user ON _user.id = :__user__ WHERE message_key = _item.title AND meta_translation.language = _user.language GROUP BY _item.value, message_value, message_key ) AS _meta ON _meta._select_value = _event.event_type_select

chart.name: chart.user.by.open.cases.bar

chart.name: chart.created.leads.average.duration.first.opportunity
chart.title: Average duration between lead and first opportunity (days)
chart.dataset: SELECT AVG(DATE(op.createdOn) - DATE(ld.createdOn)) as average, to_char(ld.createdOn,'MM-yyyy') as title FROM Lead ld INNER JOIN ld.opportunitiesList op WHERE DATE(ld.createdOn) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) AND DATE(:toDate) AND NOT EXISTS ( FROM ld.opportunitiesList op2 WHERE op2 != op AND op2.createdOn < op.createdOn) GROUP BY to_char(ld.createdOn,'MM-yyyy') ORDER BY to_char(ld.createdOn,'MM-yyyy')

chart.name: chart.team.sale.order.amount.won.target.bar
chart.title: Sales orders amount won historical
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.saleOrderAmountWon) AS _saleOrderAmountWon, SUM(self.saleOrderAmountWonTarget) AS _saleOrderAmountWonTarget, self.periodTypeSelect as _period, self.toDate as _toDate FROM Target self WHERE self.team = :activeTeam GROUP BY self.periodTypeSelect, self.toDate ORDER BY self.toDate

chart.name: chart.team.sale.order.created.number.target.gauge
chart.title: Sales orders created number target completed (%)
chart.dataset: SELECT self.saleOrderCreatedNumber*100/self.saleOrderCreatedNumberTarget AS _saleOrderCreatedNumber FROM Target self WHERE self.team.id = :team and self.fromDate <= :date and self.toDate >= :date and self.saleOrderCreatedNumberTarget > 0

chart.name: chart.customer.crm.activities
chart.title: CRM Activities
chart.dataset: SELECT coalesce(COUNT(_event.id),0) AS _num_event, selection_item.title AS _type FROM meta_select as selection JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id LEFT JOIN ical_event as _event ON _event.type_select=cast(selection_item.value as int) AND _event.contact_partner=:id WHERE selection.name = 'crm.event.type.select' GROUP BY _type
